entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
